title: Chat History Input
description: Upload your chat export to analyze
placeholder: Enter or paste your chat text here...
supported_formats: Supported: .txt file or .zip containing a .txt file (max 5MB)
privacy_notice: We do not store your chat history, the cached file on our server will be automatically deleted after 30 minutes.

platform_upload.title: How to export Your Chat Data
platform_upload.description: Select your messaging platform and upload your chat data for analysis

json_uploader.title: How to export Your Chat Data
json_uploader.description: We'll analyze your chat history and provide insights
json_uploader.auto_sort_message: Messages will be auto sorted by timestamp.
json_uploader.upload_prompt: Click to upload your {platform} JSON file

upload_box.title: Start Using Chat Recap AI
upload_box.description: Use sample or upload chat file, Click FREE Analyze or AI Recap.

upload.title: Upload Chat History
upload.description: Upload your chat export to analyze
upload.drop_files: Drag and drop your file here
upload.drag_drop: Drag and drop file here or click to select

sample_chat_text:
[2025/1/1, 01:00:00] ALICE: Happy New Year! 🎉
[2025/1/1, 01:02:00] JEFF: Happy New Year, my love! 🎆
[2025/1/1, 08:15:00] ALICE: First coffee of the year! ☕
[2025/1/1, 08:20:00] JEFF: Cheers to many more! 🥂
[2025/1/1, 10:30:00] ALICE: What's the plan for today? 🤔
[2025/1/1, 10:32:00] JEFF: Let's go for a walk in the park🌳
[2025/1/1, 11:05:00] ALICE: Sounds perfect! 🌞
[2025/1/1, 13:00:00] JEFF: Got any new year's resolutions?
[2025/1/1, 13:10:00] ALICE: To travel more! 🌍
[2025/1/1, 13:15:00] JEFF: That's a great oneI'm with you on that✈️
[2025/1/1, 14:30:00] ALICE: The weather's so nice today! ☀️
[2025/1/1, 14:35:00] JEFF: Perfect day for an adventure, don't you think?
[2025/1/1, 16:00:00] ALICE: I was thinking of getting some ice cream🍦
[2025/1/1, 16:10:00] JEFF: Oh, I'm in! What flavor?
[2025/1/1, 18:30:00] ALICE: What should we have for dinner?
[2025/1/1, 18:32:00] JEFF: Pizza? 🍕
